notes: Epicenter: Low-lying riverside community at river bend; severe flooding 48-72hrs; rice paddies; high rat population near granaries; most cleanup activity; poorest drainage; 80% homes flooded waist-deep or higher
Commercial and residential center; largest barangay; moderate flooding in low areas; better construction; municipal water system (partially functional); rapid drainage; some cleanup work
Fishing and farming community; stilt houses; flood-adapted elevated structures; moderate flooding 24-36hrs but good drainage; communal wells; less intensive cleanup

Upland barangay; higher elevation residential area; minimal flooding; served as evacuation site; spring-fed water systems; best sanitation (90% coverage); government employees and teachers; control area
